title.en: The Heart of the Verdant Abyss

description.ko: 고대 수중 숲의 호흡을 닮은, 유기적 섬유를 따라 흐르는 리드미컬한 빛의 맥동.
description.en: A rhythmic pulse of light flowing through organic fibers, mimicking the breathing of an ancient underwater forest.

prompt: An intricate, pulsating heart-like organ made of translucent emerald moss and glowing sap, suspended in a deep underwater kelp forest. Bioluminescent organic shapes and flowing liquid light tendrils wrap around the core, pulsing with life. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Features heavy subsurface scattering on the mossy fibers, volumetric light shafts piercing through dark green water, and global illumination reflecting off floating spores. Cinematic lighting, sharp focus on the microscopic texture of the breathing light.
